mapper.select: select o.id, o.code, o.name, a.default_login, (select count(*) from rrm_users_role r where a.users_id = r.users_id and a.org_id = r.org_id) as role_count from rrm_users_org a join rrm_org o on a.org_id = o.id and o.is_deleted = 0 where users_id = #{usersId} order by o.code
mapper.update: update rrm_users_org set default_login = 0 where users_id = #{usersId}
update rrm_users_org set default_login = 1 where users_id = #{dto.usersId} and org_id = #{dto.orgId}
